title: Bitcoin Falls 2.3% to $68,674 as Crypto Funds See Large Outflows
description: Bitcoin traded for $68,674.29 on Monday morning, down 2.28% from its price a week ago of $70,279.32. The decline came despite U.S. markets being closed for Washington’s Birthday today. For context, the S&P 500 fell 1.28% over the past week, while the Nasdaq dropped 1.27%. The Week’s Volatility Story Bitcoin’s real drama unfolded Friday. On ... title: XRP Gains 2.6% As a Wave of Ripple Partnerships Are Announced
description: XRP (CRYPTO: XRP) is trading at $1.4731 on Monday, up 2.6% from where it traded a week ago. Overall, the token trades 19.6% below its January 1 price and 59% from where it traded during July.
